actions.committee: Committee on Budget pursuant to the order of section 258(a)(3) of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Budget pursuant to the order of section 258(a)(3) of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Budget pursuant to the order of section 258(a)(3) of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985
actions.text: Committee on Budget. Ordered to be reported without amendment unfavorably.
Committee on Budget. Reported to Senate by Senator Sasser unfavorably without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 81.
Failed of passage in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 5-92. Record Vote No: 55.

official_title: A joint resolution suspending certain provisions of law pursuant to section 258(a)(2) of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985.

summary.text: Modifies specified provisions of law concerning the Federal budget process, including emergency sequestration powers, due to a low-growth report by the Congressional Budget Office.

titles.title: A joint resolution suspending certain provisions of law pursuant to section 258(a)(2) of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985.
